additional_buffs.description: Automatically opens golden treasure chests containing gold at a certain percentage. (Basic 10%, +2% per 5-star and +5% per 6-star)
additional_buffs.name: Golden Treasure Chests

buffs.description: Even if Aladdin is at the Time Shop, this has an increased chance to get 10x gold. (Basic 10%, +2% per 5-star, +5% per 6-star) when using human secret skills.
buffs.name: Human's Secret Skill
